items.title: Newcastle contact police after Willock receives racist abuse
items.summary: Newcastle United contact the police after midfielder Joe Willock is the subject of "disgusting" racial abuse and "deeply disturbing threats" online.

items.title: Ruben Amorim sacked by Manchester United and Darren Fletcher takes interim role â€“ live
items.summary: Amorim sacked after losing power struggle over transfers Darren Fletcher to take charge for game at Burnley Have any thoughts? Send them to Dom via email 1. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer (2018-2021) â€“ 54% win rate The Norwegian started off as a caretaker and his impact was so great that United granted him the full-time job. Undoubtedly the best football of the post-Ferguson era was played under Solskjaer, who preferred his side to counter-attack at speed and enjoyed a sensational record against Manchester City and Pep Guardiola, beating them three times at the Etihad. Came second in the league in 2020-201 but was denied an elusive trophy by the agonising 2021 Europa League final defeat to Villarreal on penalties. Continue reading...

items.title: De Ligt (26) krijgt door ontslag Amorim te maken met twaalfde trainer in carriÃ¨re
items.summary: Het ontslag van RÃºben Amorim bij Manchester United betekent dat Matthijs de Ligt wederom een nieuwe trainer krijgt. Interim-trainer Darren Fletcher wordt alweer de twaalfde oefenmeester waar de 26-jarige verdediger mee te maken krijgt.

items.title: How Nancy's calamitous 33-day reign unfolded at Celtic
items.summary: BBC Sport takes an amble through Wilfried Nancy's short tenure as Celtic manager.

items.title: Scheidsrechtersaanstellingen: Makkelie trapt af, Kooij fluit PSV
items.summary: De Eredivisie ontwaakt komend weekend uit zijn korte winterslaap. De KNVB heeft de scheidsrechtersaanstellingen voor de komende speelronde bekendgemaakt.

items.title: Bayern wonderkid Karl reveals Real Madrid dream
items.summary: Bayern Munich wonderkid Lennart Karl has revealed that we "definitely" wants to play for Real Madrid at some point in his career, calling the Spanish giants his "dream club."

items.title: Kean boosts Fiorentinaâ€™s hopes after leaping from bench he should not have been on | Nicky Bandini
items.summary: Win over Cremonese was only made possible after a late injury led to match-winnerâ€™s inclusion as a substitute The man who breathed life into Fiorentinaâ€™s survival bid was not meant to be playing at all. Moise Kean returned to training on Saturday after almost a week away attending to a private family matter. The clubâ€™s manager, Paolo Vanoli, did not intend to name him in the matchday squad to face Cremonese one day later, but had his hand forced by a late injury to Edin Dzeko. â€œI have to tell the truth because thatâ€™s how I am â€“ Iâ€™m a sincere person,â€ explained Vanoli at a press conference on Sunday. â€œWhen [Kean] came back I told him â€˜Moise, out of respect for the group, Iâ€™m not even going to put you on the benchâ€™.â€ Continue reading...

items.title: Neeskens jr. onder Poortvliet: 'Voetbalgek in de goede zin van het woord'
items.summary: John Neeskens (32) is dit seizoen te bewonderen in het shirt van FC Eindhoven. De zoon van de in 2024 overleden Johan Neeskens speelt momenteel onder leiding van Jan Poortvliet, die nog met zijn vader samenspeelde.

items.title: Tactics, transfers and turmoil - inside the fall of Amorim
items.summary: After 14 months, Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United - but where did it all go wrong?

items.title: Amorim out as Man Utd coach after 14 months
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United from his role as head coach.

items.title: Sources: Utd sacked Amorim after Wilcox row
items.summary: Ruben Amorim was sacked by Manchester United in the aftermath of an explosive meeting with director of football Jason Wilcox on Friday, sources have confirmed to ESPN.

items.title: Sources: Rosenior in London, close to Chelsea job
items.summary: Chelsea are moving closer to the appointment of Liam Rosenior as their new head coach after the 41-year-old arrived in London on Sunday, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Wilfried Nancy sacked by Celtic after eight matches and 33 days in charge
items.summary: Frenchman leaves club after dismal spell in charge Celtic six points behind Hearts at top of Premiership Wilfried Nancy has been sacked by Celtic after eight matches â€“ and 33 days â€“ in charge, in the wake of Saturdayâ€™s 3-1 home defeat by Rangers. Nancy lost six of his eight games and losing the Old Firm game from 1-0 up at half-time proved the final straw after a dismal spell. The 48-year-old leaves with Celtic six points behind Hearts in the Scottish Premiership, and having lost the League Cup final to St Mirren. Continue reading...

items.title: Bliksemontslag: Celtic neemt na acht duels afscheid van trainer
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy claimde zelf dat een ommekeer heel dicht bij was , maar de kans daarop krijgt de trainer van Celtic niet. De Schotse club maakt maandag bekend afscheid te nemen van de Fransman.

items.title: Celtic sack manager Nancy after eight games
items.summary: Celtic sack manager Wilfried Nancy after just 33 days in charge - with head of football operations Paul Tisdale also dismissed.

items.title: Celtic sack Nancy after six defeats in eight games

items.title: Draper set to make return to action from injury in GB Davis Cup tie
items.summary: Latest news around British No 1 Jack Draper as he prepares to make his return to action in February.

items.title: Raducanu suffers first ever loss to Sakkari on tennis return at United Cup
items.summary: Emma Raducanu suffered defeat on her return to action on Monday as Greece's Maria Sakkari beat her 6-3 3-6 6-1 in the United Cup, live on Sky Sports Tennis.
